item.title: US-26 West at OR-35 North
item.description: US-26 West at OR-35 North. Use OR-35 North for Hood River; US-26 West for Portland. Mount Hood is in the background of the photograph.

item.title: US-26 West Approaching OR-35
item.description: US-26 West approaching OR-35 in Clackamas County. Use OR-35 north for Mount Hood Meadows Ski Area; US-26 West for Government Camp.

item.title: US-26 West Approaching OR-35
item.description: US-26 West approaching OR-35 North to Hood River.

item.title: OR-35 South/US-30 East at I-84
item.description: OR-35 South/US-30 East at I-84. Turn right for I-84/US-30 East to The Dalles. Continue ahead for OR-35 to White Salmon (Washington) via Toll Bridge and I-84 west to Portland.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 64
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 64 - OR-35/Mt. Hood Highway/White Salmon/Government Camp. OR-35 crosses the Columbia River north of here, connecting to White Salmon, Washington. The next crossing of the Columbia River eastbound is in The Dalles. Westbound, the next crossing is at Cascade Locks.

item.title: I-84 West Approaching Exit 64
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 64 - US-30/OR-35/Mount Hood Highway/White Salmon (WA)/Government Camp.
